description: Refined design expands versatility. Pared to the essentials, the Kyanite LT’s focused minimalism frees it perform as a midlayer or standalone across a range of activities. Its lightweight Torrent™ fleece provides measured warmth ideal for a range of shoulder-season conditions. Breathable, quick-drying, and exceptionally soft, the material stretches to elevate ergonomic freedom and hold the fit close to the body for improved fabric efficiency and layering comfort. A low-profile hood adds warmth.
name: Arcteryx Kyanite LT Hoody - Mens
